issue.title: www.vanillaprepaid.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.vanillaprepaid.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vanillaprepaid.com%2F) ### Comment > If I visit the site with Adguard enabled, it will show an error message before I even put any card details in. With Adguard still enabled AND correct card details entered, it still shows an error message. > > When adguard is off and the correct card details are entered, the error message goes away and the site works properly. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/QYQ1Oa6.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/G1PEggq.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.9.2.1234+release Browser: | Safari Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/mac_v2/filters/15.txt, DnsUserRules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard+Extra+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js) Referrer: | [https://www.vanillaprepaid.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vanillaprepaid.com%2F)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
